name: Modulo Minero
description:
This is the game prototype designed for the Coursera Course:

Desarrollo y Diseño de Videojuegos

Instructions:

Collect all the silver minerals to win.

Full screen recommended. Use the blue full screen button inside the game window.

Main engine: Space Bar
Tilt Left: Q
Tilt Right: E
Slide Left: A
Slide Right: D

Landing Gear: L
Guns:G
Fire: Enter
